I'm interested in languages, interfaces and data aggregation. My $€£¥ comes from working as a developer, UI/UX designer and digital media creator. Sometimes, I write things down.

I previously worked as a research assistant and game developper for Lablablab, a teacher assistant for the departement of Design and Computation Arts at Concordia University, and as a research assistant for OBX Labs.

Things I know

LAMP (wanna do less), MEAN (wanna do more), git, npm, bower, grunt, gulp, javascript (intermediate), LESS, SASS, Vagrant, AWS, Heroku, Bootstrap, JIRA, Jekyll, regex (advanced) Linux (Debian, Ubuntu, some CentOS & Fedora), Python (intermediate), Processing(P5) / Java, bashscript, MaxMSP, Adobe CS6+ (advanced), Balsamiq, english (fluent), french (native), Chatscript (advanced), Unity3D, Rhino, REST, hardware (Arduino, Rasberry Pi, Odroid), Canon 5D + Magic Lantern
